title: 09/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 09/01/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin shares an epiphany he had about the Patriots with Mac Jones as their new starting quarterback and if they’ll be successful in 2021. He argues despite his early “success” this one NFL quarterback who won the MVP never had a prime stretch of his career being elite. He also believes Tom Brady and the Buccaneers might have the best overall roster in the NFL over the last 15 years. Plus, Chiefs head coach Andy Reid joins the show to talk about the evolution of their high-powered offense and adapting to a rebuilt offensive line.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

Plus, Chiefs head coach Andy Reid joins the show to talk about the evolution of their high-powered offense and adapting to a rebuilt offensive line.
